overview:
John Caliguri brings over 10 years experience with IT company start ups and has been integral to the direction and success of Paycorp since its inception. John is a director of several Australian and overseas companies which he has formed and progressed to various stages of maturity.

John has an Education Degree from the University of Canberra and after completing his university qualifications in 1984 he taught secondary education. John continues coaching and mentoring athletes to Olympic and World Championships standard.

John brings value to an idea, or product or organisation through his action orientation, rational thinking, business acumen and experience in the information, communication and technology sector.
